data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent:
Hi Team!
The ____ game ____ on Wednesday, ____ I ____ we ____ all ____ for ____ afterwards! Why don't we ____ to Gino's Bar ____ 8 o'clock, ____ I'll ____ us ____ pizzas. If you'd like to bring your girlfriend or boyfriend, please do so!
data.partBlankContent:
Hi Team!
The b__ game i_ on Wednesday, a__ I th___ we sho___ all me__ for dri___ afterwards! Why don't we he__ to Gino's Bar a_ 8 o'clock, a__ I'll or___ us so__ pizzas. If you'd like to bring your girlfriend or boyfriend, please do so!
data.fullContent: Hi Team! The big game is on Wednesday, and I think we should all meet for drinks afterwards! Why don't we head to Gino's Bar at 8 o'clock, and I'll order us some pizzas. If you'd like to bring your girlfriend or boyfriend, please do so!
data.answer: 嗨，团队！ 大型比赛在星期三举行，我认为之后大家应该见面喝酒！我们为什么不八点钟到吉诺酒吧呢，我会点些披萨。如果你想带上女友或男友，就请带过来吧！
